OrgName: Novartis Institutes for BioMedical Research, Inc.
activities: i)Expert consultant data processed for scientific advice and speaking engagements; ii) Vendor contact and background information for review of qualifications and for processing payments; iii) Clinical investigator contact and background data for clinical trial purposes;and iv)Inventor contact information for patent protection purposes

recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities panel for dispute resolution involving residents of the European Union, and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for dispute resolution involving residents of Switzerland.
